title: Undo/Redo System

criteria.notes: Wired in battle_editor.rs handle_key(), calls undo_stack.undo()

criteria.text: Ctrl+Y redoes the last undone action
criteria.notes: Wired in battle_editor.rs handle_key(), calls undo_stack.redo()

criteria.text: Undo stack limited to 50 entries maximum
criteria.notes: MAX_UNDO_SIZE=50, oldest entries dropped via drain(0..excess)

criteria.text: State is correctly restored on undo/redo
criteria.notes: UndoCommand enum captures old/new state for all 6 operation types

checklist.item: Define UndoCommand trait/enum for action types
Ensure correct state restoration on undo/redo

worker_notes: Implemented command-based undo/redo system. UndoStack uses cursor-based approach: commands[0..cursor] are undoable, commands[cursor..len] are redoable. push() truncates redo history then enforces max_size=50. Ctrl modifier tracked via ctrl_held bool in BattleEditorApp, following the same pattern used in battle_arena.rs. All 6 UndoCommand variants implemented: AddOutline, RemoveOutline, ModifyOutline, ChangeExtrudeParams, MeshSnapshot, VertexColors.
learnings: winit 0.30 tracks key codes via PhysicalKey::Code(KeyCode), modifier state must be tracked manually with a bool field
battle_arena.rs already uses ctrl_held pattern for Ctrl+Z/Y/C/V shortcuts - followed same approach for consistency
